name: 3 Seconds
description: 3 Seconds! is a guessing game wherein the Player must guess the correct combo generated by the Enemy. How to Play • After the “Ready!” shows up the screen the player presses two keys from “A”, “S”, “D”, “F”, “G” • The Player must press his/her two guesses during the three second timer • The Player will inflict damage if he/she correctly guesses both of the AI’s move. Note: Player deals full damage if he/she guesses both letters correct if one out of two, half damage would be dealt for both the Player and Enemy.
